attributes.action: abandon the proposed ID card scheme as this government is incompetent in protecting personal information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The loss of personal and bank details of 25,000,000 people and their children proves this Soviet style government is incapable of being trusted with the current level of information let alone the huge increased information proposed by the ID card scheme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
